text:
brandcomply.com | Front-end Web Developer and Full-stack Web dev internships | Atlanta, GA | Onsite | Email resumes to john@octane5.com

BrandComply's mission is "Empowering Brands to Improve the World." We're helping Fortune 100 companies protect their brands and end counterfeit and grey-market products that perpetuate child labor and fund criminal & terrorist organizations. If you're in the Metro Atlanta area and want to help us in our mission, please email us for more details.
